text:    The United States and Israel have both accused Iran of using its atomic energy program as cover for a plan to develop nuclear arms .

FE:    {'Communicator': 'both', 'Evaluee': 'Iran', 'Reason': 'of using its atomic energy program as cover for a plan to develop nuclear arms'}

====================================================================================================

both     -- positive ->     Iran
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Judgment_communication.Communicator ?_p ?_t
both     -- positive ->     _SOMETHING
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
?_s ?_p Judgment_communication.Evaluee
_SOMEONE     -- positive ->     Iran
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
